## NodeCanvasRenderingContext2D.createImageData() method

Create empty ImageData with the provided dimensions.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
createImageData(width: number, height: number): IImageData;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  width | <code>number</code> | The width of the ImageData. |
|  height | <code>number</code> | The height of the ImageData. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`IImageData`
